ConnectforHealth 

Your invite to Cigna Healthcare's wellbeing webinar series 

At Cigna Healthcare, we recognize the importance of prioritizing your health and wellbeing. As your health and wellness partner, we are fully committed to helping you establish healthy habits. 

You are invited to join Cigna Healthcare’s Connect for Health webinar on: 

Prevention is key to outsmarting cancer 

Learn how you and your loved ones can be proactive through focused awareness, healthy routines and preventive measures to lower your cancer risk. 

 	  	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bc126220d-91e1-40d2-b6cb-df0b6286d51c%7D_2023-brand-leaf.png> 	 	 Save the date 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bef802401-370c-4712-9218-60c559e443ae%7D_calendar.png> 	 	 Date: Wednesday, February 12th

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B140e7be3-ca9e-4dbd-8207-7fd388d309c7%7D_time.png> 	 	 Time: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM (Gulf Standard Time) 

Click here to register <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/grKlCzxLjS8QDwxigi9T9rwGb?domain=event.on24.com> 	
 	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B703b49a9-2bca-489f-a83b-be761cdd01a9%7D_Harjit_Bahia.JPG> 	Harjit Bahia
Founder & CEO - Longevity 

Harjit Bahia, obtained her Master’s in Pharmacy from the University of Nottingham in 2010. She then worked at renowned medical facilities in London, developing a passion for DNA and medicines during her studies. She went on to specialize in Oncology, particularly breast cancer. 

Outside her profession, Harjit pursued fitness and nutrition, earning certifications in personal training and nutrition. Recognizing the disparity between medical and fitness advice, she aimed to integrate both realms. She has become a trusted figure, leveraging her diverse expertise to bridge the gap between science and health, aiming to help people live longer and healthier lives. Harjit founded Longevity UK which offers evidence-based, scientific programs for preventative health and longevity in London, Dubai and Hong Kong.
